name: getSOAPResponse
description: Returns an XML object that contains the entire SOAP response after invoking a web service.

params.name: webservice
params.description: A webservice object as returned from the cfobject tag or the createObject function.

examples.title: Create a SOAP call and retrieve the response
examples.description: Create a SOAP webservice to call, then we can use  getSOAPResponse() to view the full response
